attributes.action: referendum to dissolve the House of Lords
attributes.additional_details: Ask the electorate if they want a 2nd "scrutiny" tier, then should it be elected by a national elective system by the UK citizens, rather than an honorary one?
attributes.background:
As an unelected law making institution, operating in a democratic environment, there is no recourse to anyone, particularly the citizens of the UK, regarding their decisions.
And the cost to the taxpayer, is unacceptable.
